item.title: Events
item.description: Welcome to our Events! Here, you will find out all you need to know about the events we have organized for you! Grill Welcome Event! Sign Up Date 20. 5. 2022 at 17:00 Where K칛ferberg Grillstelle Details Event Sign up Sign up Price free for CSSZ members / 8CHF (you can become member here) .sign-in{ padding:5px 15px;background-color:rgb(30,30,30);color:white;border-radius:5px;float:right; } .sign-in:hover{ background-color:rgb(50,50,50); } .sign-in:active{ background-color:rgb(70,70,70); }

item.title: About us
item.description: The CSSZ (Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich) is an association founded by 4 ETH students from Czech Republic and Slovakia. Goals of The Association To unite the community of students from the Czech Republic and Slovakia in Zurich. This goal is achieved by organizing various social events. By organizing these for everyone (participation is not limited by nationality, religion or gender), we also want to present Czech and Slovak culture.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: You can either contact us on general info@cssz.ch or contact a specific board member. Address: Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich c/o VSETH CAB E27 Universit칛tstrasse 6 8092 Z칲rich Switzerland
